name: 4Towers Combo TD: Classic Edition
description:
4Towers is an Tower Defence where players form combos and other power ups around 4 basic Towers.

Gameplay Video: http://bit.ly/dparfm

-----------------------------------------
MAJOR FEATURES
-----------------------------------------

GAME CENTER AND OPENFEINT DUAL SUPPORT FOR LEADERBOARDS AND ACHIVEMENTS!

We now have 18 DIFFERENT TOWERS (56 including UPGRADES). New Towers in Episode 2 include:
- The Missile Barrage Platform
- The Ice Trap Platform
- The Artillery Bombardment Platform
- The Buffer, 'aka Bloodlust', Platform

New BRUTAL enemies.
- The Death Healer.
- The Tough Swarmer.
- The Spawner.

We have more than DOUBLED the number of levels available! Also new in these levels are 3 SUPER HARD CHALLENGE levels. Not for the weak!

We've added DIFFICULTY modes. Choose between EASY, MEDIUM and HARD.

Additional Much Requested Features based on feedback:
- Fast Forward Button!
- Quick Tutorial Access!
- New Score Tracking System!
